title: Litro starts unloading 3,700 MT of Gas
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas said that the unloading of 3,700 MT of gas from the lastest shipment will be carried out at the Kerawalapitiya Terminal.
Litro further said that they’re expecting to deliver 100,000 gas cylinders on Tuesday (22).
Two more gas ships are scheduled to arrive in Sri Lanka next Thursday (24) and Friday(25).
US $ 6 Mn Maritime Rescue Coordination Center from India to Sri Lanka
